items.content_html: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.

Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: Fetchify is a lightweight and flexible library for making HTTP requests in JavaScript/TypeScript applications. It allows managing custom configurations, token authentication, and supports request and response interceptors. Compatible on both client and server.
